title: Alert Log Errors (24h) / Uyarı Günlüğü Hataları (24s)
description: Shows alert log errors and warnings from the last 24 hours

queries.sql: SELECT originating_timestamp, severity, message_text FROM v$diag_alert_log WHERE severity IN ('Error', 'Warning', 'Critical Error') AND originating_timestamp >= SYSDATE - 1 ORDER BY originating_timestamp DESC FETCH FIRST 100 ROWS ONLY

doc_hint: Shows alert log entries in last 24 hours. Critical/error entries require investigation. May indicate I/O, memory, or recovery issues.
analysis_prompt: Review alert log errors. Identify: (1) severity levels, (2) recurring error patterns, (3) if any ORA- errors indicate missing indexes/objects, (4) recommend action.
